channel.title: Dashboard embedded Security Acces
channel.description: Hello everyone! Someone discovered how to embedding a dashboard but ask for login or use some private keys ? Sharing a public url is quite risky, I think embedding is one of the best features but we have to find a way to make it safe. Thank you!

item.title: Dashboard embedded Security Acces
item.dc:creator: pablofernandezconekt
item.description:
Hello everyone!
Someone discovered how to embedding a dashboard but ask for login or use some private keys ?
Sharing a public url is quite risky, I think embedding is one of the best features but we have to find a way to make it safe.
Thank you!
